meanings: Assistant adverb do something while doing something

vlive.korean: [또 귓속말 하려다가 보내지는 뽐] 가라고 가! [JB is kicked out when he tried to whisper again] Leave! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 눈 덩어리보다 더 반가운 덩어리들,, 아이러브유💚 (GOT7’s acrostic poem bet)

vlive.korean: [식초 식혜 마신 자][눈에 뵈는 거 없음] - 야, 우지야 - 너무... - 바로 가라고 바로! [Vinegar drinker] [Has gone crazy] - WOOZI! - That's... - Just do it! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.2 2020 : MYSTERY MYSTERY #2
vlive.english: [Vinegar drinker] [Has gone crazy] - WOOZI! - That's... - Just do it!

examples.korean: He waved them away with an impatient gesture. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 짜증스런 몸짓으로 그들에게 가라고 손을 흔들어 댔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He waved them away with an impatient gesture. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Me? Join the army? Not likely! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나요? 군대에 가라고요? 말도 안 돼요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Me? Join the army? Not likely! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Leaving the doors unlocked is an open invitation to burglars. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 문을 잠그지 않는 것은 도둑질을 해 가라고 유혹하는 것이나 마찬가지이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Leaving the doors unlocked is an open invitation to burglars. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Leaving your camera on the seat in the car is an open invitation to thieves. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자동차 좌석 위에 카메라를 놔두는 것은 도둑들에게 훔쳐 가라고 부추기는 것이나 마찬가지이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Leaving your camera on the seat in the car is an open invitation to thieves. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She insisted that we leave tomorrow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 우리에게 내일 가라고 고집했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: She insisted that we leave tomorrow. Add to Wordbook
